sections.text: practices prohibited.A company entering into an agreement under the Invest Nebraska Act is prohibited from requiring as a condition of employment or promotion at the project that an employee or an individual applying for employment at the project submit to a genetic test or provide genetic information outside the scope of normal blood testing.SourceLaws 2001, LB 620, ยง 37.

77-5537.Employment practices prohibited.

A company entering into an agreement under the Invest Nebraska Act is prohibited from requiring as a condition of employment or promotion at the project that an employee or an individual applying for employment at the project submit to a genetic test or provide genetic information outside the scope of normal blood testing.

SourceLaws 2001, LB 620, ยง 37.
